column2: "...Hello. I suppose this is the first time meeting you solo."
"Katori and myself are acting independently. We conduct weapon performance tests periodically."
"Since she proposed a competition, and it doesn't interfere with our other objectives, I was not about to decline."
"Although... it baffles me why. The result is already obvious."
"Regardless of the reason, I must honor that relentless spirit to never give up in the face of failure."
"Katori is immature, indolent, shallow, arrogant, and socially incompatible..."
"But when it comes to this unyielding spirit of hers, I believe the other failings can be overlooked."
"Indeed, this spirit is likely the most important quality a Class Administrator can have."
"...Otherwise, I fail to see how that dropout could have possibly been chosen for the position."
"...In any case, you can say you've fulfilled your obligation to her with this conversation."
"That she asked you to distract me is blatantly obvious. That dimwit."
"I absolutely cannot allow her to win when she resorts to petty schemes such as this."
